## ğŸ”§ Installation

If you installed this integration via **HACS**, you will receive this update automatically.

If you installed manually:

1. Download the ZIP from this release
2. Extract it into:
   `custom_components/wifi_qr_decoder/`
3. Restart Home Assistant
